programme.title: Daitona
programme.desc: Daitona follows a thrilling journey of survival as its characters face high-speed danger and treachery.

programme.title: Boot Hill
programme.desc: Honey Fisher has become a powerful man in a small Western town. Fisher and his gang have managed, through swindling, murder, and terror, to gain leases on the important gold-yielding land in the area. Cat Stevens and Hutch Bessy join forces with circus performers and townsfolk to fight against Fisher and his henchmen.

programme.title: Smile Before Death
programme.desc: Marco, a penniless nobleman, unhappily married to the wealthy Dorothy Emerson, has a lover, Gianna. She, one day, rids him of his irritating spouse, killing her. Having automatically become the administrator of his estate - which, however, he must pass on to Nancy, Dorothy's first-born daughter, when he turns twenty - he retires to live with Gianna in a luxurious villa on the shores of a lake. Here he is joined by the pretty future heiress, whom he had never met. In order not to have to give up the enjoyment of her wealth, Gianna incites Marco to kill the girl. The man, however, ends up falling in love with her and so does Gianna.

programme.title: Play Motel
programme.desc: A secluded motel becomes the center of a web of mysteries and criminal activity.

programme.title: Boot Hill
programme.desc: Honey Fisher has become a powerful man in a small Western town. Fisher and his gang have managed, through swindling, murder, and terror, to gain leases on the important gold-yielding land in the area. Cat Stevens and Hutch Bessy join forces with circus performers and townsfolk to fight against Fisher and his henchmen.

programme.title: Nevermind
programme.desc: Five people are turned upside down by puzzling and paradoxical happenings. A lawyer with a deplorable habit; a baby sitter struggling with a disturbing new job; an old childhood friend with a murky present; a cook with an unmentionable desire; and a psychologist haunted by a tow truck. Five stories that will lead the protagonists to extreme and unpredictable choices.

programme.title: Dorian Gray
programme.desc: Dorian, a young man of rare beauty, is shocked by a painter's stunning portrait of him. Knowing that sooner or later the harmony of his features will be faded by time, while the portrait will always remain the same, Dorian makes a wish: that only the portrait will grow old!

programme.title: Dead Uncle
programme.desc: Cristian, who has no job and no desire to find one, has only one way out: to retrieve the urine of a jaguar in the remote Apulian countryside to carry out a very dangerous mission.

programme.title: Bed of a thousand pleasure
programme.desc: A whimsical reimagining of the famous 1001 Nights, filled with intrigue, romance, and fantasy.

programme.title: Kidnap Syndicate
programme.desc: Based on an actual event "The Kidnap Syndicate" is the story of two boys, one from a rich family and the other from a poor family, who are kidnapped and held for ransom.

Fisher and his gang have managed, through swindling, murder, and terror, to gain leases on the important gold-yielding land in the area. Cat Stevens and Hutch Bessy join forces with circus performers and townsfolk to fight against Fisher and his henchmen.
